meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to express surprise or emphasis.
meanings.sent1: Begorra! That was a close call!
meanings.sent2: Well, begorra, I never expected to see you here!
meanings.sent3: Begorra, I nearly jumped out of my skin when the cat startled me!
meanings.sent4: The thunder roared, begorra, like a lion in the night.
meanings.sent5: Begorra, the fireworks lit up the sky with a dazzling display!

meanings.definition: Used as a mild oath or expression of annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Begorra! I can't find my keys anywhere!
meanings.sent2: Oh, begorra, why does this always happen to me?
meanings.sent3: Begorra, the traffic jam made me late for work again!
meanings.sent4: The stubborn jar lid refused to budge, begorra, no matter how hard I tried.
meanings.sent5: Begorra, the rain ruined my freshly washed car!
